62038.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「魔:

62039.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「こ:
The master was fascinated by the items of this world, and his love for them eventually grew to the point where he
became devoted to the study of drawing out the abilities of the items.

62040.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「だ:
However, the Demon World people always, always, always urged the master to continue the development of
enhancement drugs instead of doing meaningless research.

62041.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「あ:

combat weapon using an item.

62042.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「そ:

gadget No. 1, Wardrobe.<stop_lip_animation m16205 CLOSE_MOUTH>

62043.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「ボ:

was never able to fight again.

62044.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「敗:

who are skilled in handling items.

62045.<start_lip_sync m16205 _normal m00001>「そ:
